node.html:
• Led the development of data-driven solutions. Developed and executed data-driven product development.
    • Implemented automated moderation using NLP techniques that resulted in a 40% decrease in costs incurred of review moderation.
    • Reduced the review moderation time by 4 folds.
    • Improved business KPIs such as conversion rates by 7%, customer satisfaction scores to 81%, and customer retention rate to 77%.
  • Led a team with projects on transformers, recommendation, and term normalization, doubling the team’s bandwidth in the delivery of the project.
  • Built a graph neural network from scratch for the domain of software marketplace. Achieving:
    • 41% increase in user session duration.
    • 17% increase in the interaction between user-product and approved reviews, enhancing the effectiveness of the recommendation system.

• Implemented an automated solution to math word problem by leveraging Graph Neural Networks & NLP techniques.
  • Applied data augmentation through structured paraphrasing to enhance the quality and diversity of the training dataset.
  • Fine-tuned MathBERT and T5 models on a custom domain corpus, achieving a significant improvement in performance and accuracy.
  • Optimized and deployed end-to-end transformer architectures on production servers, resulting in a 30% reduction in response time and 15% improvement in overall system efficiency.

• Creation of Fashion Knowledge Graph, using various techniques of NLP–sentence segmentation, sequence tagging, dependency parsing
  • Implemented Vertical Search Engine with NLU and BERT-as-a-service, resulting in 68% improved search relevance and 0.3 seconds reduction in response time

• Contributed to Peer-Assessment framework inspired by open-edX for Sunbird.org and ekShiksha.org.in.
  • Created web-based interactive 3D framework: PIE, a low-resource version of three.js. Based on OpenGL
